alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; North Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:51PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wasco County through 415 PM PDT... At 351 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Warm Springs Reservation, or 20 miles southeast of Government Camp, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Grove and northwestern Warm Springs Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; North Central Oregon
